--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  The pod screamed down the hill side. Suddenly it was
> hit by a shot of lighting. It went down. The protoform
> was surley doomed. But the clouds darkened as the
> spark refused to be extinquished.  Suddenly a miracle
> happened or a nightmare. The protoform stabalized in
> its protoform. It was stuck. It slithered across the
> ground. It went past a dead bot. (destructor.) It
> transformed and took his shape. It had no weapons. Its
> only power was to make sharp or heavy mettalic objects
> with all it's limbs. (If anyone has seen terminator 2.
> Its the same idea) He could not speak. But he would
> learn how to adapt thier voice soon enough. He walked
> amilesly. His past gone. His future uncertain. (Anyone
> who wants to recruit him....hurry up. Hopefuly megs.)
